Text.val: -- Enabel/Disable button "Modify" in the toolbar for call ODHC05DET
related to the permissions of ODHC05DET
-- Filter criterias only for table ARCH

-- Shortcut labels
// Author: Juergen Paarmann
13.08.2013 SH SCR18338 Extended ODHC05G argument list
08.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
16.04.2012 SH SCR17254 Removed GB900.PI.GROUP=CLNT208_HGROUP (ODHC05 called as ODC004)
21.03.2012 SH SCR17089 Changed display of ARCH_FULLNOTICE in tabular view
02.03.2012 SH SCR17053 Introduced information barrier
01.02.2012 SH SCR17089 Task "Display ARCH_FULLNOTICE": Changed display of ARCH_DOCPATH to SCFD_FILENAME (Unicode) if
row exists in SCFD
18.07.2010 GB SCR15623 Removed test for GNDP
17.06.2010 GB SCR15540 Replacement calls BMQ002 by the BMQ005
09.07.2009 SH SCR14720 Removed button Ratings
07.12.2008 GB SCR14175 Changed screen to 1024*768
28.11.208 SH SCR14168 Extended HADH (ODH002) handling with HATA
03.03.2008 SH SCR9302 Removed German GNRL_ARCHIVEMETHOD = 1 handling;
Archive docs: Replaced the separate calls of GM103/GM104/HSM by GM100
25.10.2007 SH SCR13040 Changed ODHC05G1.PI.DEPARTMENT into ODHC05G1.PI.TYPE
10.09.2007 SH SCR12297 Added ODHC05G1 to enter scan values (not hyarchive view)
27.04.2007 SH SCR12484 Added BMQ002.PI.DATE = null
02.07.2007 SH SCR12291 Button Scan: Added GSET_YESNO(238)= 'Y' to perform tests
on CODE where CODE_NUMBERA3 =
25.10.2006 SH SCR11776 Added PI.DOCTYPE, PI.DOCDATE to ODHC05G call
06.10.2006 SH SCR11947 Added PI.DCHD_NO for ODHC05G
21.07.2006 SH SCR11620 Extended argument list of ODHC05DET, new out parameter
uses in OMQ140 if ODHC05DET is called from this program
13.06.2006 SH SCR11403 Added PI.LCHD_NO and PI.LCHI_NO for ODHC05G
13.03.2006 SH SCR10606 Replaced ARCH_FULLNOTICE by ARCH_DOCPATH since
the conversion has problems with BLOB fields
11.03.2006 SH SCR10606 Added new function to archive view --> button "Query"
in tollbar to open view for ARCH_FULLNOTICE; button "Modify" to start
ODHC05DET - Detail screen archive rows; Added new field ARCH_DATEDELETED
must be null to enable for view
07.02.2006 SH SCR10330 Remove special handling to enter/select document type,
not done for HYPARCHIVE_VIEW
31.01.2006 SH SCR10277 Changed selction criterias for ARCH in case of ODC004 -->
using PI.DEBC_NO now
26.01.2006 SH SCR10132 Added "ScreenRefresh" after button "New document", for
Archive and empty view.
17.01.2006 SH SCR10125 Button "Scan" --> Changed document text to be optional
and call GB007 for MQ58 only in case of GRL_CODE = NL.
27.12.2005 SH SCR9931 Button "New scan" Fixed bug with fetching sequence
number for scanning in case of ODH002 or ODC004 usage
27.12.2005 SH SCR9639 Removed test on ARCH_DEBC_NO = PI.DEBC_NO
in case ODH05 is called as ODC004
19.12.2005 SH SCR9763 Button "New scan" Removed special handling the select
only document where HADT_DISPLAYINZOOMLIST = Y from archive view and
in empty view, the tests are only performed if GNRL_ARCHIVEMETHOD = 1
16.12.2005 SH SCR9825 Added v.Filter to archive view only
14.12.2005 SH SCR9763 Enabled button "New Scan" also for debtor client handling
30.11.2005 SH SCR9639 Added new argument PI.DEBC_NO to call of ODHC05G and
changed selction criterias for ARCH in case of ODC004
09.11.2005 AS Added logic to display documents from Radiant Archive
see task ARCHIVE_VIEW.Control Event
07.11.2005 SH SCR9445 Added new arguments to list for ODHC05G
26.07.2005 SH SCR8547 Added new arguments for BMQ002, both skipped
01.07.2005 SH SCR8631 Selection: Debtor Heller (ODH002) --> Only distinct
DHDU_DEBH_NO_OLD numbers are used now to prepare SQL string for
DB SQL WhereClause on view "v_factorlink_hyparchive"
17.06.2005 AS SCR# 8267 -> fixed calls to ODHC05G
01.06.2005 MW SCR#8405 --> Solution for negative doctypes
05.04.2005 MW SCR#8050 --> Added a new param to the F5-zoom (Code_description)
in the 'select Dokumenttype'-tasks
09.02.2005 SH SCR7780 Switched tables ARCH, HUSR and v_factorlink_hyparchive
from WRITE mode to READ and added condition to Handler "Unmapped erros" only if
GNRL_ARCHIVEMETHOD = 1 (message"Archive server not available")
01.02.2005 SH SCR7752 Undo changes from 31.01.2005
31.01.2005 SH SCR7752 Added new parameter PI.HUSR_DEPT_CODE, pass to
program to add/query debtor client notes
04.01.2005 SH SCR7524 Replaced functions for button "New document" by a call to
ODHC05G NewDocument
on 4.11.2004 WJ SCR7285 add new button XML Archive
//08.10.2004 SH SCR7154 Remoced condition to perform function "Notes all clients
-- > only on debtor client level, from "HYPARCHIVE_VIEW" and "ARCHIVE_VIEW", was
already removed from "Empty-VIEW"
//24.09.2004 SH SCR7061 Changed arguments for BMQ002 --> button "New scan",
added check for ADMNO_DELCREDERE before staring BMQ002
//24.09.2004 SH SCR7060 Added new parameter pi.DEBC_DEBC, uses to obtain DBEC
if ODC004, to get the first debtor client (check ADMN_DELCREDERE)
//10-08-2004 BT SCR #6715 implement focus to stay in Hayparchive
under condition (Task: HYPARCHIVE_VIEW/ControlEvent)
//11.08.2004 SH SCR6754 Enabled button "Notes all clients" also for debtor
heller screen (ODH004)
//10-08-2004 BT SCR #6715 implement focus to stay in Hayparchive
under Condition: see Task HYPARCHIVE_VIEW/Control Event
//05-05-2004 JP SCR #5748 implement writing information into logfile as copy
from Released version
//05-05-2004 SH SCR6151 Extended selection of hyparchive with all old debtor
heller, where DHDU_DEBH_NO_NEW = p.DEBH_NO
//22-04-2004 SH SCR5963 Use always 'HADH' as arguemnt for BXA028 if
HUSR_DEPT_CODE = GNDP_DEPT_CODE where GNDP_ID = 4
//23-01-2004 SH SCR5087 Removed call to empty view if GNRL_ARCHIVEMETHODE = 0
- and program starts, otherwise this empty view was opened every time although
- there are row in table ARCHIVE
//22-01-2004 SH SCR5087 Call ARCHIVE_VIEW now if GNRL_ARCHIVEMETHODE <> 1
//21-01-2004 SH SCR5087 Added function to new button "New Document", only
- relevant if GNRL_ARCHIVEMETHODE <> 1
//20-01-2004 AS SCR5087 new button "New Document"
//14-01-2004 SH SCR3387 If ADMN_DELCREDERE = TRUE v.DEBC_NO will be used now
- to call the print program for telephone notes, instaed of PI.DEBC_NO, see
- User Action 13
//22-12-2003 SH SCR5087 Added new task ARCHIVE_VIEW, call to TaminoViewer
is still not implemented, see SCR for details
//30-10-2003 JP SCR #4633 implement new button "notes all client"
22.09.2003 EE -> SCR4379 New Button SCAN
14.08.2003 RR -> SCR3193 Implemented shortcut-handling
24.06.2003 RR -> SCR3832 Implemented new 'Limit-decisions'-Screen

- and for telephonenotes
